SUBJECT: Statement of guiding principles for the Federal Acquisition System.
TEXT: The military departments and defense agencies shall provide a rolling annual forecast of acquisitions at the end of each quarter (i.e., arch 31; June 30; September 30; December 31), to the Deputy Director, Defense Procurement and Acquisition Policy (Contract Policy and International Contracting).
